entry.title: Installing Cygwin & the Rsync Package
entry.summary:
How to Install Cygwin on Windows and Add the Rsync Package
If you‚Äôre a Windows user and want to access Linux-like tools and packages, Cygwin is a great solution. Cygwin provides a large collection of GNU and Open Source tools, which offer a Linux-like environment on Windows. One such tool is rsync, a powerful utility for file synchronization.
In this post, we‚Äôll walk through the installation ...
